plot: When a shoelace factory employee is confronted with the monotony of her life, she must decide if expressing herself is worth sacrificing the comfort of predictability.
title: Cordones
plot_es: When a shoelace factory employee is confronted with the monotony of her life, she must decide if expressing herself is worth sacrificing the comfort of predictability.
plot_en: When a shoelace factory employee is confronted with the monotony of her life, she must decide if expressing herself is worth sacrificing the comfort of predictability.
